price: (Mwibuke) umunsi Allah azakoranya Intumwa zose akazibaza ati “Mwasubijwe iki (ubwo mwahamagariraga abantu kwemera Imana)?” Zizasubiza ziti “Nta bumenyi tubifiteho, mu by’ukuri ni Wowe Mumenyi uhebuje w’ibyihishe.”
arabic: ۞ يَوۡمَ يَجۡمَعُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلرُّسُلَ فَيَقُولُ مَاذَآ أُجِبۡتُمۡۖ قَالُواْ لَا عِلۡمَ لَنَآۖ إِنَّكَ أَنتَ عَلَّٰمُ ٱلۡغُيُوبِ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: yawma yajmaʿu al-lahu al-rusula fayaqūlu mādhā ujib'tum qālū lā ʿil'ma lanā innaka anta ʿallāmu al-ghuyūbi
